Change Log :
==========

1.0.1 (16/08/2022)
-------------------
- First Release

===============
<b> EXAMPLE :

```
from migho_yt import mp4
from migho_yt import info
from migho_yt import mp3


url = input('[+] YOUTUBE URL : ')

infos = info(url)
print(infos)           #to return video info.

mp4(url, storage=None) #storage -> Keep it default or choose a folder name

mp3(url,path=None)      #path -> Keep it default or choose a folder name

```
